title: The Platform Fighter Rebuilt From Failure - Rushdown Revolt

media:group.media:title: The Platform Fighter Rebuilt From Failure - Rushdown Revolt
media:group.media:description:
Enter at http://www.omaze.com/akshonesports for your chance to win an Unplugged Tesla Model S Plaid S-APEX and support a great cause.

Rushdown Revolt is a platform fighting game with elements inspired by titles from Guilty Gear to Smash Bros that has defied the odds and has risen from the ashes of Icons Combat Arena: https://youtu.be/OqWm9sMgkj8

It's not every day that a game is given a second chance after a rough launch and subsequent shutdown a few years later. 

While Rushdown Revolt is by no means a major mainstream hit just yet like the Super Smash Bros series or Multiversus, the team behind this project is taking a grassroots approach working alongside various communities to raise awareness while still in development.

This is the story of Rushdown Revolt, an innovative platform fighter that rebuilt itself from failure.
